body: When a character wears a slotted wondrous item he cannot gain the benefit from a wondrous items of the same slot until the first item is removed. Of course, a character may carry or possess any number of slotted items of the same type, but additional items have no effect until they are worn. Sometimes a slotted wondrous item must be worn for a period of time (typically 24 hours) before the item's full effect manifests. If a creature is missing the body part where a wondrous item is worn, it cannot use that type of slotted item. If a creature has multiple body parts that correspond to a single wondrous item slot, it can still only gain the benefit of one item of that slot.
name: Slotted Wondrous Items

sections.body: This slot consists of belts and other items that can be worn around the waist.
sections.name: Belt

sections.body: This slot consists of body wraps, cassocks, corsets, dusters, harnesses, robes, vestments and any other article of clothing that can be worn on the body.
sections.name: Body

sections.body: This slot consists of jackets, mantels, shirts, vests and other items that can be worn around the torso or chest.
sections.name: Chest

sections.body: This slot consists of goggles, lenses, monocles, spectacles, and other items that can be worn over the eyes.
sections.name: Eyes

sections.body: This slot consists of boots, horseshoes, sandals, shoes, slippers, and other items that can be worn on the feet.
sections.name: Feet

sections.body: This slot consists of gauntlets, gloves, and other items that can worn on the hands.
sections.name: Hands

sections.body: This slot consists of circlets, crowns, hats, helms, hoods, masks, and other items that can be worn on the head.
sections.name: Head

sections.body: This slot consists of bands, headbands, laurels, phylacteries, and other non-head slot items that can be worn around the forehead.
sections.name: Headband

sections.body: This slot consists of amulets, brooches, medallions, necklaces, periapts, scarabs, and other items that can be worn around the neck or fastened to a cloak.
sections.name: Neck

sections.body: This slot consists of capes, cloaks, cords, mantels, pauldrons, shawls, stoles, wings, and other items that can be worn on the shoulders.
sections.name: Shoulders

sections.body: This slot consists of armbands, bracelets, bracers, gauntlets, manacles, shackles, vambraces, and other items that can worn over the wrists.
sections.name: Wrists
